Reviews.Title: My 1st Pentax DSLR
Reviews.Author: Jeffery B. Vu "kool100vr4"
Reviews.Content: Hi all.I just bought my first Pentax DSLR K-R model in White body only on late Oct 2010, and received it on Nov- 8 2010, after reading a lot of reviews on the Pentax KX model,[...]i was impressed and waited for 4 weeks before i got it in my hands. I even called Pentax here in Golden Colorado. USA and asked them when is the KR coming out?, Yeah,  i sold my Sony 700 DSLR gear and replaced with KR. I bought a Tamron 70-200mm F2.8 for it, as expected KR is a small and compact body which i like, simple design, easy to use, tons of features, nice neck strap, i wish they make a battery grip for it, but not...Ok, so i tested it out with about 400 shots in all settings, especially on high Iso and watch for noise, here are the samples, the shots w/o flash was shot at 12,800 ISO[...]And here with 800 Iso[...]Pictures speak for itself, i really like the IQ, high iso with low noise and it is well control, not as nasty noise as some other cameras brand( no name), i like the DNR and smooth details low noise, true colors, sharpness and easy to use, fast shooting 7fps..For the price  you just can not beat it...Sorry Sony but i have found a new buddy.Cheers.JV

ProductInfo.Features:
12.4-megapixel CMOS sensor; compact, lightweight body
Body only; lenses sold separately
Widescreen 720p HD video at 25fps; powerful automatic shooting modes including Pentax Auto Picture
3-inch LCD with 921,000 dots of resolution; wide range of in-camera image processing and special effects filters
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC/SDXC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Pentax K-r 12.4 MP Digital SLR Camera with 3.0-Inch LCD (White Body)
